statements: DELETE FROM WildlifeData WHERE id = 1 AND species = 'Tiger';
DELETE FROM WildlifeData WHERE location = 'Africa' AND conservation_status = 'Endangered';
DELETE FROM Wildlifepopulations WHERE id = 10 AND population_size < 1000;
DELETE FROM ConservationEfforts WHERE success_rate > 0.8 AND location LIKE 'Africa%';
DELETE FROM WildlifePopulation WHERE species = 'Tiger' AND location = 'India';
DELETE FROM PopulationAnalysis WHERE analysis_id = 101 AND analysis_type = 'Population Trend Analysis';
DELETE FROM conservation_efforts WHERE conservation_measure = 'Protected Area';
DELETE FROM conservation_efforts WHERE species_id = 1 AND conservation_effectiveness = 'High';
DELETE FROM habitat_info WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest' AND habitat_name = 'Amazon Rainforest';
